Test data for testing [HTTPTarget.WithRawBody].

>>> valid:http_request_body
{
  "Target": {
    "id": "target_http"
  },
  "HTTPTarget": {
    "id": "rawbody_json",
    "Method": 6,
    "RequestType": 4,
    "Path": "/rawbody/json",
    "RawBody": "eyJpZCI6MSwibmFtZSI6ImdvcmFua3VzdSJ9",
    "WithRawBody": true
  }
}

<<< valid:RunResponse.DumpRequest
POST /rawbody/json HTTP/1.1
Host: 127.0.0.1:22796
User-Agent: libhttp/0.53.0
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/json
Accept-Encoding: gzip

{"id":1,"name":"gorankusu"}

<<< valid:RunResponse.DumpResponse
